post.text:
Donald Trump has spent years peddling lies about President Obama.

And that didn't stop today.

comment.author: Keith
comment.text: COMRADE TRUMP! Putin has made Trump's mission to make America a third-world country. His "policies" are void so he can't be tracked if he gets in office. Trump will receive his payoff from the communists are there will be no legal recourse for the common people.
